LanguageData.WorkFrenzy.label: !!work frenzy
LanguageData.WorkFrenzy.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. HECAP will work 2.5 times faster for the next 24 hours.
LanguageData.GoFrenzy.label: go frenzy
LanguageData.GoFrenzy.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. HECAP will walk 1.5 times faster for the next 24 hours.
LanguageData.ShootFrenzy.label: shoot frenzy
LanguageData.ShootFrenzy.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. HISCAP shooting accuracy will be improved for the next 3 days.
LanguageData.InspiredTrade.label: inspired trade
LanguageData.InspiredTrade.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. HECAP will get a significant trade price bonus for HIS next trade deal.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days or when the deal is done.
LanguageData.InspiredRecruitment.label: inspired recruitment
LanguageData.InspiredRecruitment.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. HECAP will successfully recruit the next prisoner regardless of difficulty.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days or when the prisoner is recruited.
LanguageData.InspiredSurgery.label: inspired surgery
LanguageData.InspiredSurgery.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. The surgery failure chance for the next surgery performed by HIM will be 10 times smaller.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days or when the surgery is performed.
LanguageData.InspiredArt.label: inspired art
LanguageData.InspiredArt.beginLetter: {0} has just been inspired. Any piece of art completed will be 3 quality levels higher than it would otherwise be.\n\nThe inspiration will end after 8 days or when the piece of art is completed.
